chapter.title: Schema srdb
chapter.para: This schema handles all tables and views for the RAM Legacy assessment database.

section.title:
Table:
area
section.para: Stock areas, used in the definition of stocks.

itemizedlist.title: Tables referencing stock via Foreign Key Constraints
Tables referencing brptots via Foreign Key Constraints
Tables referencing assessment via Foreign Key Constraints

section.title:
Table:
assessor
section.para: Details of assessors. An assessor must be associated with a management boby from the table srdb.management.

itemizedlist.title: Tables referencing assessment via Foreign Key Constraints

section.title:
Table:
biometrics
section.para: Definition of point metrics such as reference points, life-history parameters and description of timeseries (e.g. age of recruitment, ages used in F calculations, etc.).

itemizedlist.title: Tables referencing bioparams via Foreign Key Constraints
Tables referencing lmetostocks via Foreign Key Constraints

section.title:
Table:
management
section.para: Management bodies, used in the definition of stock areas and stock assessors.

itemizedlist.title: Tables referencing area via Foreign Key Constraints
Tables referencing assessment via Foreign Key Constraints

figure.title: Definition of view reference_point_units_view

section.title:
View:
reference_point_values_view
section.para: This is a view that organises the reference points into separate columns.

figure.title: Definition of view reference_point_values_view

section.title:
Table:
referencedoc
section.para: RIS fields containing the reference document for an assessment.

itemizedlist.title: Tables referencing referencedoc via Foreign Key Constraints

section.title:
Table:
spfits
section.para: This table stores the parameter estimates from the Schaefer surplus production model ran against the catch and total biomass timeseries.

section.title:
Table:
stock
section.para: A stock consists of a species (field "tsn" from srdb.taxonomy), an area (field "areaid" from srdb.area). This table also keeps track of stocks that were in RAM's original database and the name used there if it is different from the stockid defined in the RAM Legacy database

itemizedlist.title: Tables referencing assessment via Foreign Key Constraints

section.title:
Table:
taxonomy
section.para: Taxonomic information obtained from the Integrated Taxonomic Information System (ITIS). Negative values for taxonomic serial number (TSN) are used in cases where a stock is of a species not present in ITIS.

itemizedlist.title: Tables referencing fishbasesaupcodes via Foreign Key Constraints

figure.title: Definition of view timeseries_units_view

section.title:
Table:
timeseries_values_view
section.para: This is a materialised view that organises the timeseries into separate columns.

section.title:
Table:
tsmetrics
section.para: Definition of timeseries such as recruits, spawning stock biomass, total abundance, etc.

itemizedlist.title: Tables referencing brptots via Foreign Key Constraints

figure.title: Definition of view tstruncation_pdfs
Definition of view tstruncation_ssbseries
figure.programlisting: SELECT aa.stockid , aa.tsyear , max (aa.ssbmyers) AS ssbmyers , max (aa.ssbnew) AS ssbnew FROM ( SELECT ass.stockid , ts.tsyear , CASE WHEN ( (ass.recorder)::text = 'MYERS'::text ) THEN ts.tsvalue ELSE NULL::double precision END AS ssbmyers , CASE WHEN ( (ass.recorder)::text <> 'MYERS'::text ) THEN ts.tsvalue ELSE NULL::double precision END AS ssbnew FROM srdb.assessment ass , srdb.timeseries ts WHERE ( ( ( (ass.assessid)::text = (ts.assessid)::text ) AND ( (ts.tsid)::text ~~ '%SSB%'::text ) ) AND ( (ass.stockid)::text IN ( SELECT tstruncation_summary.stockid FROM srdb.tstruncation_summary WHERE ( ( (tstruncation_summary.tsid)::text ~~ '%SSB%'::text ) AND (tstruncation_summary."First year similar" = 'no'::text) ) ) ) ) ) aa GROUP BY aa.stockid , aa.tsyear ORDER BY aa.stockid , aa.tsyear;

figure.title: Definition of view tstruncation_summary
figure.programlisting: SELECT cc.stockid , cc.stocklong , cc.tsid , cc.ramyrs AS "Myers years" , cc.newyrs AS "Updated years" , CASE WHEN (cc.newminyr = cc.ramminyr) THEN 'yes'::text ELSE 'no'::text END AS "First year similar" FROM ( SELECT bb.stockid , bb.tsid , bb.stocklong , max (bb.ramyrs) AS ramyrs , max (bb.ramminyr) AS ramminyr , max (bb.rammaxyr) AS rammaxyr , max (bb.newyrs) AS newyrs , max (bb.newminyr) AS newminyr , max (bb.newmaxyr) AS newmaxyr FROM ( SELECT aa.stockid , aa.stocklong , aa.tsid , CASE WHEN ( (aa.recorder)::text = 'MYERS'::text ) THEN aa.yrs ELSE NULL::text END AS ramyrs , CASE WHEN ( (aa.recorder)::text = 'MYERS'::text ) THEN aa.minyr ELSE NULL::integer END AS ramminyr , CASE WHEN ( (aa.recorder)::text = 'MYERS'::text ) THEN aa.maxyr ELSE NULL::integer END AS rammaxyr , CASE WHEN ( (aa.recorder)::text <> 'MYERS'::text ) THEN aa.yrs ELSE NULL::text END AS newyrs , CASE WHEN ( (aa.recorder)::text <> 'MYERS'::text ) THEN aa.minyr ELSE NULL::integer END AS newminyr , CASE WHEN ( (aa.recorder)::text <> 'MYERS'::text ) THEN aa.maxyr ELSE NULL::integer END AS newmaxyr FROM ( SELECT a.stockid , st.stocklong , a.recorder , ts.assessid , ts.tsid , min (ts.tsyear) AS minyr , max (ts.tsyear) AS maxyr , ( (min (ts.tsyear) || '-'::text ) || max (ts.tsyear) ) AS yrs FROM srdb.timeseries ts , srdb.assessment a , srdb.stock st WHERE ( ( (ts.tsvalue IS NOT NULL) AND ( (a.assessid)::text = (ts.assessid)::text ) ) AND ( (a.stockid)::text = (st.stockid)::text ) ) GROUP BY a.stockid , a.recorder , st.stocklong , ts.assessid , ts.tsid ORDER BY a.stockid , a.recorder ) aa ) bb GROUP BY bb.stockid , bb.stocklong , bb.tsid ) cc WHERE ( (cc.ramyrs IS NOT NULL) AND (cc.newyrs IS NOT NULL) );

section.xreflabel: srdbsrdb_metric_boolean(assessment text, metric text, category text)
section.title: srdb_metric_boolean(assessment text, metric text, category text)
section.titleabbrev: srdb_metric_boolean(assessment text, metric text, category text)
